com.google.code.arm.sql
Class AutoCloseDataSource

java.lang.Object
  com.google.code.arm.lang.DelegatingObject<S>
      com.google.code.arm.sql.DelegatingWrapper<S>
          com.google.code.arm.sql.DelegatingDataSource<DataSource>
              com.google.code.arm.sql.AutoCloseDataSource
All Implemented Interfaces:
Wrapper, CommonDataSource, DataSource
public class AutoCloseDataSource
extends DelegatingDataSource<DataSource>
implements DataSource

Wraps a DataSource so that it provides AutoCloseable Connection instances from the getConnection() and getConnection(String, String) methods.
